ISSUE.TITLE: Is there a different way to connect a Smartphone?
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hello guys, i got a short question regarding Smartphone connection. Is it possible to connect a Smartphone with the STF service via WiFi and not via USB? If not yet, are you planing features like that? P.S: I'm the succesor of Felix Hahn. He was already in contact with you. Thanks.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Remove npm install from Debian x64 Dockerfile (#260)
